trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design para controles de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner> provides a design-time representation of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control with a menu to access the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> property for the convenience of the page developer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner> Fornece uma representação de tempo de design de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controle com um menu para acessar o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> coleção e o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> propriedade para a conveniência de desenvolvedor de página.

trans-unit.source: It is the only zone designer that does not support designer regions.
trans-unit.target: É o designer de zona única que não oferece suporte a regiões de designer.

trans-unit.source: This is because <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controls uses links to create connections instead of a drag-and-drop user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: Isso ocorre porque <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controles usa links para criar conexões, em vez de uma interface de usuário de arrastar e soltar (IU).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> property both appear on the verbs menu of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> coleção e o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> propriedade aparecem no menu de verbos de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controle.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>, when selected, provides a selection of color schemes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A>, quando selecionado, fornece uma seleção de esquemas de cores.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> check box, when selected, displays the contents of the control as it would appear in the browser; the control will be empty until a connection is made.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> caixa de seleção, quando selecionado, exibe o conteúdo do controle como apareceria no navegador, o controle estará vazio até que uma conexão é feita.

trans-unit.source: You can inherit from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner> to support a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control as with any other control designer.
trans-unit.target: Você pode herdar de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner> para dar suporte a um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controlar como com qualquer outro controle de designer.

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to change the markup that renders the control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> método para alterar a marcação que renderiza o controle.

trans-unit.source: You can also override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> collection to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> with a custom scheme.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> coleção para adicionar um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> com um esquema personalizado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to hide additional properties from a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control by overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como ocultar propriedades adicionais de um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controle substituindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box for the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de esquemas de formatação automáticos e predefinidos a serem exibidos na caixa de diálogo **Autoformatação** do controle associado no tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: A predefined <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> with a default ConnectionZone scheme.
trans-unit.target: Um modelo predefinido <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection" /> com um esquema de ConnectionZone padrão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> property overrides its base implementation to get a predefined collection that is specific to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> propriedade substitui a sua implementação base para obter uma coleção predefinida que é específica para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que é usada para representar o controle no tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that is the markup to represent the control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que é a marcação para representar o controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> control associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> associado ao designer.

trans-unit.source: Binds the designer to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Associa o designer ao controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> of the set of properties associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> do conjunto de propriedades associadas ao controle.

trans-unit.source: Hides a preset group of properties at design time.
trans-unit.target: Oculta um grupo de propriedades predefinido em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method overrides the parent method to hide the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneTextStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A> properties in the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método substitui o método pai para ocultar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.EmptyZoneTextStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartStyle%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartTitleStyle%2A> propriedades no designer.

trans-unit.source: This is because the properties in question are not rendered by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controls and are therefore not relevant.
trans-unit.target: Isso ocorre porque as propriedades em questão não são processadas pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> controles e são, portanto, não é relevante.

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner> class overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de como substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZoneDesigner> tópico de visão geral da classe.
